item.description:
Coach Kevin better known as SupahFans, celebrates the holiday season with an all day In-Store Holiday Shopping Party at his SupahFans Streetware shop on Saturday, December 4 from 10 am to 9 pm and beyond at another location.

The store is located at 470 Commonwealth Avenue in Kenmore Square.

To find out what is really going on and to get an invite and special coupons please go to his SupahFans.com website and sign up for his newsletter.

Expect the party to really get going after 4 pm with treats and refreshments.



More information at or E Mail Kevin on the Red Sox Natives site.

More details to follow from Kevin!
item.name: SupahFans In-Store Holiday Shopping Party
